SEARCH
Module application.client
Package server

Class App

java.lang.Object
server.App
public class App extends Object
The main class representing the server application. This class initializes and manages the server, database connection, and user interface. It provides methods for starting and stopping the server, setting up the database connection, loading and saving settings, and performing various operations related to the application.
Since:
2023-12-28
Version:
1.0
Author:
Your Name
